lines.text: Appendix 5 contains the resuics
APPENDIX 3
NITROSAMINES IN CIGARETTE SHOKZ
The objective of the exmminetion of cigerette smoke for the
presence of dimethyi nitrosamine (deou) is to determine if this
compoumd is present in fresh cigerette rmoke or if it forme in
the trep during the collection of the smoke.
Cellulose powder trape are presently used for the collection of
cigarette smoke Tpm with back-up cold treps or short columns of
silica gel to collect the gases.
The celluloee powdar trap wes tested for the trapping of dimthyl-
nitroemmine by vaporising tecxa in a stream of nitrogen which pessed
through the trep. Subsequent removel of the Deou from the cellulose
by vicinim distilletion resulted in a 70% recovery of the mou es
determined by gas chroxetography. silics gel trepping of
dimethylesine proved to be successful as evidenecd by the formetion
of teeca after passing oxides of uitrogen through the silice gel.
Bo evidence of Deaci wes found in the vecuum distillete from the
emoke of all burley cigarettes when it ws collected on cellulcse
powder. Acetone wshings of the liquld nitrogen backup tray did
give a peak on the gae chrometogrem with a retention time neer that
for a etandard semple of DIA.
Meriboro monitor #9 filters from smoked cigerettes wre vacuum
diotilled and the distillete enelyzed by ges chrometogrephy. A peak
wae recorded on the gas chrometogrem with a retention time very
close to that for Deou.

APPENDIX 3

The objective of the exmminetion of cigerette smoke for the

the trep during the collection of the smoke.
Cellulose powder trape are presently used for the collection of

silica gel to collect the gases.
The celluloee powdar trap wes tested for the trapping of dimthyl-
nitroemmine by vaporising tecxa in a stream of nitrogen which pessed
through the trep. Subsequent removel of the Deou from the cellulose
by vicinim distilletion resulted in a 70% recovery of the mou es

of teeca after passing oxides of uitrogen through the silice gel.

emoke of all burley cigarettes when it ws collected on cellulcse

give a peak on the gae chrometogrem with a retention time neer that

diotilled and the distillete enelyzed by ges chrometogrephy. A peak
